page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: This area of{England}is basically rural. Much of the block is taken up by the {Ashdown Forest.}The land is gently undulating with good clay soils in the vales. The forest comprises a variety of deciduous and coniferous trees with large areas of open space covered in heather.By South Eastern standards the area is sparsely populated. Surrounding the forest are small farms, but many of these are now used as country residences or small holdings for the wealthy landowners. { {Housing}is expensive in this area with many large, detatched properties in and around the village and on the edge of the forest. The{A22}is the only major road passing through the area on its way from{London}to{Eastbourne.} This is basically an affluent area.
